adHeader: ####Professional Movers, Licensed and Insured, Satisfaction Guaranteed
adDetails: Reliable moving service from a fully licensed and insured moving company (CPUC T 1 8 9900). Proof will be shown upon request. We provide excellent local moving services, including residence, business, office and piano. Our movers are very polite, importantly experienced, efficient and hard-working. We have professionally equipped new moving trucks We provide some free moving materials: dollies, handtIirucks, furniture blankets, wrapping tapes, and shrink wraps. We have boxes and wardrobe boxes for temporary use. We also disassemble and reassemble your furniture. Our Rates are: $65 for 2 movers, and $85 for 3 movers (minimum 2 hours) Time starts when the movers arrives at your door and ends when everything unloaded to your new location. Contact us for more information: 41 5-68 1-660 9 Excellent references are available upon request. Huge Discounts for Long-Distance Moving services Moving Services to Sacramento, Stockton, Fresno, Medesto, Santa Barbra, Los Angeles, San Diego, Las Vegas, Oregon and Seattle. Flexible Schedules and Flat Rate.
